title: (x) For The Birds - Lucian BT {Yves}
content: Not that it matters, but Lucian was not designed by Bitstream. It was released by Bauer in 1925.
author: Mark Simonson

comments.content: 1928, huh? Jasper says 1925. I'm not sure which is right, though. I wonder if anyone will ever do the other weights and styles. They are kind of interesting.
